-   [ ] simulate Xk

```{r simulate Xmat}
nsam = 10000
nsim = 100
msnp = 1000

Xmat = matrix(rbinom(nsam*msnp, 2, 0.4), nsam, msnp)
```

-   [ ] simulate polygenic model: Y and IDP (nsam x nsim)

```{=tex}
\begin{align}
Y &= \beta \cdot \text{IDP} + \sum_k X_k \cdot b_k + \epsilon \\
\text{IDP} &= \sum_k \gamma_k \cdot X_k + \epsilon',
\end{align}
```
```{r simulate Y}
## betamat msnp x 1 
betamat = matrix(rnorm(msnp),msnp, 1)
epsimat = matrix(rnorm(nsam),nsam, 1)
gYmat = Xmat %*% betamat
Ymat = gYmat + epsimat
## Ymat = scale(Ymat)
```

```{r simulate IDP}
gammamat = matrix(rnorm(msnp * nsim),msnp, nsim)
epsimat2 = matrix(rnorm(nsam * nsim),nsam, nsim)
gIDPmat = Xmat %*% gammamat
IDPmat = gIDPmat + epsimat2
```

-   [ ] calculate pvec of Y \~ IDP

```{r fit Y on IDP}
# ## load fast lm
# devtools::source_gist("5d2251ea1a86009499e4ffdf47fe2735")

## load fn_ratxcan: 115403f16bec0a0e871f3616d552ce9b
devtools::source_gist("115403f16bec0a0e871f3616d552ce9b")
devtools::source_gist("38431b74c6c0bf90c12f")

## run fast_predixcan_assoc
idnum=1:nsam
idvec = glue("id-{idnum}")
res <- fast_predixcan_assoc(data.frame(IID=idvec,IDPmat), data.frame(IID=idvec,Ymat), idlist=idvec)
qqunif(res$pval)

```
